channel.title: Range / Skillcape shop opening help?
channel.description:
How do i fix ranging on the Crazy PVP Source, because when i equip my gear with mage bow and rune arrows, etc... and i attack a monster ( Man, paladin, dagganoth, rock crabs ) etc... i get kicked after 6-7 seconds then it logs me back in straight away, can anyone please help me? Rep+ Award.
And one more problem is when i want to open the skillcape shop it just does not open :S:S i got the same npc from the original Crazy PVP Source, and i added it to the autospawn.cfg, and i compiled, but the shop does not open, i got the other NPC which wears a white top and black bottoms with a bold head.. and his shop does not open aswell, can anyone please help me :confused: :)

item.title: Range / Skillcape shop opening help?
item.dc:creator: @r_4_v_1 r 4 v 1
item.description:
@r_4_v_1 wrote:

Ok, the skillcape problem is solved thanks a lot mate :)! now i need help with the range

Read full topic

item.title: Range / Skillcape shop opening help?
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

You have to do a few steps.

  1. Go into Client Class. Search ‘Wanneshop’. But TWICE.(2 times)

Should see something like this?

if(NPCID == 2537){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; }

Then just create a new one.

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ####; }

The NPCID is the Npc id, pretty self explanatory.

The WanneShop is the number of your shop in shops.cfg .

If you’re creating a new shop, then start from the last number. Say the last shop number was uhm. 52

You’d create something like this

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 53; }

Then the next would be 54, etc.

Read full topic
